snippet: Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. is entering his 10th term, and it is one that could define the legacy of the court he leads.
abstract: Supreme Court is returning to work to face rich and varied docket that may define legacy of Chief Justice John G Roberts Jr, who is entering his 10th term, as well as legacy of court; some of larger issues being considered include whether same-sex marriage is constitutional right and new challenge to Affordable Care Act.
lead_paragraph: Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. is entering his 10th term, and it is one that could define the legacy of the court he leads.

headline.main: Supreme Court’s Robust New Session Could Define Legacy of Chief Justice
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court’s Robust New Session Could Define Legacy of Chief Justice

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
